column4: I am trying to install ubuntu on my hp dv6693us laptop. When I try to run it from usb or install it, the screen is not right. It is split up in 3 sections and blurry. almost like an old windows 95 problem. What could be causing this and is there any way to install ubuntu on my laptop?
has anybody heard of my ubuntu problem? look up.....
Which graphics card does it have?
